**[VPSGet](https://vpsget.com/)** has a vision of providing best quality services with affordable prices for each customer.
<br>We know how to cook virtual servers!
<br>We offer Pure SSD VPS  and Hybrid Storage VPS.

=============================================
<br>10% LIFETIME DISCOUNT ON ALL VPS PACKAGES.
<br>Use promo code: **VPSGETLET10**
<br>=============================================

Our servers are located at Tier III datacenter in Netherlands, Europe . 
<br>Test IP: 91.239.64.11 . Test download files : [100Mb](https://vpsget.com/testfiles/100MB.zip), [1Gb](https://vpsget.com/testfiles/1GB.zip)

**Features:**
<UL>
<LI>[Free Managed Service](https://vpsget.com/knowledgebase/94/managed-vps-support.html)
<LI>Full Root Access
<LI>RAID-10, Pure SSD Storage, HW Raid Controller [pure ssd]
<LI>RAID-10, SAS15k SSD cached storage, HW Raid Controller [hybrid storage]
<LI>Xeon E5 processors
<LI>SolusVM Control Panel ([reinstall OS](https://vpsget.com/knowledgebase/54/how-to-reinstall-os-at-your-vps.html), change root password,etc..) + 

whitelabeled reseller accounts available!
<LI>TUN/TAP/PPP (you can use any VPN)
<LI>100Mbps connection for each VPS (multiple uplinks on each node)
<LI>Free IPv6
<LI>99.9% Uptime Guarantee
<LI>30 days Money Back Guarantee
<LI>Instant Setup
<LI>A lot of Linux distributions for choice
<LI>[Custom OS templates](https://vpsget.com/knowledgebase/23/operating-systems.html)
<LI>No Contract
<LI>24x7 Support (in-house team)
<LI>Daytime LiveChat
<LI>Up to 30 IPv4 add-on available per VPS for only $1 per IP for customers who using our services for 6+ months
<LI>Massive [KnowledgeBase](https://vpsget.com/knowledgebase.php) and [wiki](http://wiki.vpsget.com/index.php/Category:Linux) pages
</UL>

----------------------------
<br>We provide a **lot of [OS templates](https://vpsget.com/knowledgebase.php?action=displayarticle&id=23) for customers**. Some of them are available

Should you have any pre-sales questions please do not hesitate to **[contact](https://vpsget.com/contact.php)** our Sales Team!
